description: Notice of Proposed Procurement (NPP)TASK Based Professional Services (TSPS) Requirement This requirement is for: Immigration and Refugee Board (IRB)This requirement is open only to those Supply  Arrangement Holders under E60ZT-18TSPS who qualified under “Tier 1” (= $0 - $3.75M) for the following category: 2.12 Evaluation Services Consultant, one (1) Senior Resource .
